text: -FM modems capable of operating with three to 72 voice channels. Multiplex X All terminals -new FDM equipment to provide a wider range of capa­ bilities. Digital Modems X Terminals providing imagery -PSK modems will replace MFSK modems X All DCS terminals -new developmental PSK modems to provide a wide variety of data rates.
